variable.label: Starting Voltage
variable.tooltip: x (1/255 Track Voltage)

variable.label: Acceleration time
variable.tooltip: x 2ms x (1/255 Track Voltage)

variable.label: Braking time
variable.tooltip: x 2ms x (1/255 Track Voltage)

variable.label: Top Speed
variable.tooltip: x (1/255 Track Voltage)

variable.label: Med-Speed
variable.tooltip: x (1/255 Track Voltage)

variable.label: Software Version Number
variable.tooltip: The decoder version number (read only)

variable.label: Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: The manufacturer's ID number (read only)

variable.label: Motor Frequency
variable.tooltip: Factory pre-set (23.5 (16) kHz) is optimized for LGB motors

variable.label: F1 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set)

variable.label: F2 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set)

variable.label: F3 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set)

variable.label: F4 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set)

variable.label: F5 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set)

variable.label: F6 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set)

variable.label: Long Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Extended 4 digit address (Range 128-10239)

variable.label: Consist Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the multiple unit (consist) address, 0 = not in consist

variable.label: Consist Direction
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when consist is told to move forward

variable.label: Driving Direction
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward

variable.label: Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: Sets the speed step mode. 128 speed steps are recognized automatically

variable.label: Analog conversion mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco can operate on conventional DC current (enables Power Source Conversion)

variable.label: Use Speed Table
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use manufacturer's internal or user-defined speed step table

variable.label: Addressing Mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use short or long address

variable.label: Data Processing
variable.tooltip: Automatic Detection of Serial/Parallel

variable.label: Digital Load Control
variable.tooltip: Load Control keeps the loco speed constant even as the load varies

variable.label: Analog Load Control
variable.tooltip: Load Control keeps the loco speed constant even as the load varies

variable.label: F1 Output
variable.tooltip: F1 Output = Fast Pulse String (P-Update) on F1 ONLY WITH Data Processing = Serial + Parallel Data Processing

variable.label: Bus Type
variable.tooltip: Determines which protocol is used on the bus connection to other devices

variable.label: Light: Dimming Value (PWM)
variable.tooltip: Locos with interface = 32(full track voltage); direct connection of 5V bulbs = 5; direct connection of 19V bulbs = 26

variable.label: Front Light: Command Allocation - Direction
variable.tooltip: Direction for Front Light On

enumChoice.choice: Front Light On in both directions
Front Light On in Reverse only
Front Light On in Standard Driving Direction only

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Front Light

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches F1

variable.label: F1: Special Function: Blinking/Monoflop time base
variable.tooltip: 0=Steady On (Standard Operation), 1..15=Blinking/Monoflop Time Base 0.25sec per value

variable.tooltip: Which special function, if any, for F1. For Monoflop, output is switched off automatically after timeout.

variable.label: F2: Command Allocation - Direction

variable.tooltip: Which special function, if any, for F2. For Monoflop, output is switched off automatically after timeout.

variable.label: Pause Time for Stop and Reversing
variable.tooltip: 0.5 sec per Value

variable.label: Switching Speed: Command Allocation - Function Keys
variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Half Speed

variable.label: Back EMF Adjustment Factor
variable.tooltip: Big Value = Fast Regulation

variable.label: Back EMF Adjustment Speed
variable.tooltip: Big Value = Slow Regulation

variable.label: Back EMF Adjustment Strength
variable.tooltip: 255 = max. Strength

variable.label: Back EMF Start-up Behavior - Regulation Time
variable.tooltip: Adjusts the speed of load control regulation, 1-15. Only alter if instructed by manufacturer.

variable.label: Back EMF Start-up Behavior - Triggering Level
variable.tooltip: Defines the switchover point from slow approach load control to regular load control. Only alter if instructed by manufacturer.

variable.label: Engage/Disengage Acceleration/Deceleration Value: Command Allocation - Function Keys
variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Engage/Disengage Accel/Decel

variable.tooltip: Starting sound reduced during frequent direction changes

variable.label: Starting Inhibit between starting-phase
variable.tooltip: Locomotive starts only after start-up sounds complete, only for E-Locos

variable.tooltip: Type of sound - DO NOT CHANGE!! - Read Only

variable.tooltip: Loco has to accelerate to a predefined speed to enable the braking noise when slowing down

variable.tooltip: Loco has to fall below a predefined speed to trigger the braking noise

variable.tooltip: The sound to be played when the loco moves backward

variable.tooltip: The sound to be played when reed contact 1 is triggered

variable.tooltip: The sound to be played when reed contact 2 is triggered

variable.tooltip: The sound to be played when the loco slows down

variable.tooltip: Alignment of the sound to the motor RPM when starting to move

variable.label: Trigger Threshold : Sound Output in Digital Mode
variable.tooltip: Alignment of the sound to the motor RPM when starting to move

variable.label: Pulse generator : Control register
variable.tooltip: Controls use of external pulse generator to govern speed sounds

enumChoice.choice: No pulse generator (Sound is governed by the speed steps)
Steam: 1 chuff per contact Diesel/Electric: Sound is governed by pulse generator.

variable.label: Duration of a steam chuff
variable.tooltip: Length of steam chuff, 0=short steam chuff, 28=basic setting, 32=long steam chuff

variable.label: Spacing between steam chuff
variable.tooltip: Pause time between steam chuffs (only active if CV195 = 0)

variable.label: Total Volume Level
variable.tooltip: 1=Low, 63=Loud, 255=external Potentiometer
